DOC.brief_title: Safety , Tolerability , Pharmacokinetics Pharmacodynamics Multiple s.c Doses HS-20004 Healthy Chinese Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 19 28 kg/m^2 , inclusive , total body weight least 50 kg ; Clinically relevant abnormality physical examination , laboratory value , vital sign ECG finding screen , judged Investigator ; Have medical abnormality ( cardiovascular , hepatic , renal , gastrointestinal , immunologic , hematological , hormonal , metabolic , neoplasmatic mental disease ) , opinion investigator , might affect absorption , distribution , metabolism , excretion study drug , prevent patient follow complete protocol ; Family history diabetes , thyroid cancer , submandibular gland cancer , history pancreatitis , cholelithiasis , drug allergy , serious unconscious hypoglycemia positive anxious chronic viral hepatitis B , HIV antibody ; History drug alcohol abuse within 6 month randomization ; Use GLP1 analogue , DPPIV enzyme inhibitor , well hypoglycemic drug within 3 month randomization ; Use prescription drug Chinese herbal medicine within 4 week randomization ; Use non prescription drug food supplement ( vitamin , etc . ) within 2 week randomization ; Participated drug clinical trial within 3 month , participate 3 3 drug clinical trial within 1 year , blood donation/loss > 400mL within 3 month randomization ; Female subject childbearing potential use acceptable method birth control , pregnant planning pregnancy , breastfeeding , male subject use acceptable method birth control , within six month randomization ; Subject refrain smoking , eat and/or drink contain xanthine/caffeine , strenuous exercise , others affect drug absorption , distribution , metabolism excretion within 2 day study drug administration ; Subject unsuitable inclusion study opinion investigator ;
